subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pitching on four days’ rest for the first time this spring, Carl Pavano said he felt “a little funky” after working three innings on Saturday. But Manager Joe Torre called the outing “a step forward.”
snippet: Pitching on four days’ rest for the first time this spring, Carl Pavano said he felt “a little funky” after working three innings on Saturday. But Manager Joe Torre called the outing “a step forward.”
